title: Tales Of The Abyss USA UNDUB2.0 FMV Hardsub Patch-Kotoba
description:
-= Kotoba Presents =-

             Tales of the Abyss USA UNDUB 2.0 *FMV Hardsub* Patch


         -------------------------------------------------------------
         +...RELEASE INFO...+
         ____________________

            Rls Date:  2008-01-28            Region:      N/A
            Format:    imageDiff             Image Size:  N/A
            Files:     11 * 50 MB            Platform:    N/A


         -------------------------------------------------------------
         +...RELEASE NOTES...+
         _____________________

         With the skits now being voiced (huge props for implementing
         them :) ), it gave us the motivation to do this small project.

         This patch will hardsub all the movies that needed it and add
         a karaoke for the Opening. It will also re-implement all the
         movies from the USA version that were used in the game but
         weren&#039;t included in A&#039;s UNDUB 2.0. These 10 short movies have
         no dialogue and therefore can be used in the UNDUB too.


         You&#039;ll need about 10GB of free HDD space.

         *Copy "a-toaundub2.0.iso" (or make another ISO off your disc
          and name it "a-toaundub2.0.iso") to the folder where all the
          files of the patch are.
         *Run "koto-a-toaundub2.1patch.bat".
         *Once the patching process is over (it will take a while),
          you&#039;ll have a new patched ISO, "koto-a-toaundub2.1.iso".

         Enjoy :)


         -------------------------------------------------------------
         +...CREDITS...+
         _______________

         Extract/Rebuild, Encoding - slayerofgod

         Subbing - leingod

         Karaoke - ayplejuice


         -------------------------------------------------------------
         +...CONTACT...+
         _______________

         Find us. ;)
